# Welcome!

https://germolinal.github.io/clean-ui/

## Instructions

### VueJS

1. Install clean-ui
```
npm install --save clean-ui
```
2. 

### Nuxt

1. Install clean-ui
```
npm install --save clean-ui
```

2. Add the clean-ui plugin
```
module.exports = {
  plugins : [    
    '~/node_modules/clean-ui/clean-ui.nuxt'
  ],
...
```

3. Add something!
```
<template>
    <a-button :variant="'primary'"> My first button </a-button>
<template>
```
